name: PetGossip
0:
”Alexa, start pet gossip”
”Alexa open pet gossip”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pet gossip
des: This is a very simple skill where you ask Alexa to "gossip" about the family pet. Start by saying "Alexa start pet gossip" and she will give you a random response on what your beloved pet has been up to. Sometimes good, sometimes bad. Is Alexa and your pet in a rivalry for your attention? Try it and find out.
